mapper.select: SELECT b.dwl_psb_cnt > (SELECT COUNT(mbr_no) FROM cc_cpn_issue WHERE prm_no = #{prmNo}) FROM cc_prm_base AS a JOIN cc_cpn_base AS b ON a.prm_no = b.prm_no WHERE a.prm_No = #{prmNo} AND a.use_yn = 'Y' AND current_date BETWEEN a.prm_strt_dt AND a.prm_end_dt AND current_date BETWEEN b.dwl_avl_Strt_dd::date AND b.dwl_avl_end_dd::date AND b.psn_dwl_psb_cnt > (SELECT COUNT(prm_no) FROM cc_cpn_issue WHERE mbr_no=#{mbrNo} AND prm_no=#{prmNo})

SELECT EXISTS(SELECT current_date BETWEEN prm_strt_dt AND prm_end_dt FROM cc_prm_base AS a JOIN cc_cpn_issue AS b ON a.prm_no = b.prm_no WHERE b.cpn_iss_no = #{cpnIssNo} AND b.cpn_use_dt IS NULL AND b.ord_no IS NULL)

SELECT EXISTS(SELECT current_date BETWEEN a.prm_strt_dt AND a.prm_end_dt FROM cc_prm_base AS a JOIN cc_cpn_issue AS b ON a.prm_no = b.prm_no WHERE b.cpn_iss_no = #{cpnIssNo} AND b.cpn_use_dt IS NOT NULL AND b.ord_no = #{ordNo} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM cc_cpn_issue WHERE org_cpn_iss_no = #{cpnIssNo}))

SELECT cpb.prm_no , cpb.prm_nm , cpb.prm_kind_cd , cpb.prm_strt_dt , cpb.prm_end_dt , cpb.dc_ccd , cpb.dc_val , cpb.min_pur_amt , cpb.max_dc_amt , cpb.use_yn , cpat.aply_tgt_ccd , cpat.aply_tgt_no , ccb.prm_no , ccb.cpn_kind_cd , ccb.degr_ccd , ccb.mda_gb , ccb.ent_chn_gb , cci.cpn_iss_no , cci.mbr_no , cci.cpn_use_dt FROM cc_prm_base cpb , cc_prm_aply_tgt cpat , cc_cpn_base ccb , cc_cpn_issue cci WHERE cci.mbr_no = #{mbrNo} AND cpb.prm_no = cpat.prm_no AND cpb.prm_no = ccb.prm_no AND cpb .prm_no = cci.prm_no
